alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 28 at 9:35AM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Southeast Carter, Unicoi, Southeast Greene, Johnson and Southeast Monroe Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 AM EST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 1 AM to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strong winds combined with the fresh snowfall will produce widespread blowing and drifting of snow, especially across the higher elevations. Visibilities will be reduced to near zero at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
